task_description: Facing the building to your North-West (approx. 332째), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

action.answer: Estimated height: 18 meters. Rationale: The building shows 4-5 distinct floor levels with regular window patterns; using standard floor heights of 3.5-4 meters per story yields approximately 16-20 meters, with 18m as the central estimate.

reason: Observing the building at 332째NW, I can count approximately 4-5 floors with standard commercial floor heights of 3.5-4m each, suggesting a total height around 18 meters.
